properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) AS "COUNT" FROM COMMUNITY WHERE CMCG_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT CM_NO , USER_NAME , CMCG_NAME , CM_TITLE , CM_CONTENT , CM_ENROLLDATE , CM_COUNT , CM_LIKE_COUNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY R WHERE R.CM_NO = C.CM_NO) AS REPLYCOUNT FROM COMMUNITY C JOIN USERINFO USING (USER_NO) JOIN COMMUNITY_CATEGORY USING (CMCG_NO) WHERE CMCG_NO = ? ORDER BY CM_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
